title: Bali - New Testament (Print)
description: Balinese translation of the New Testament. Balinese is a Malayo-Polynesian language spoken by 3.3 million people on the Indonesian island of Bali

language.name: Bali (Nigeria)
language.area: Adamawa state, Numan LGA, at Bali, 30 km from Numan on Jalingo road.
